data: Based on the question, "During the past 12 months, has a doctor or other health professional asked you about using tobacco products or smoking?" Respondents who did not see a health professional in the past 12 months were included in the denominator and categorized as not having discussed tobacco use with a healthcare professional.

caption3: Based on the question, "During the past 12 months, has a doctor or other health professional asked you about using tobacco products or smoking?"
